thread.title: Court of Appeals invalidates fire sprinkler rule
thread.title_full: Court of Appeals invalidates fire sprinkler rule

author: Brian Johnson
title: Court of Appeals invalidates fire sprinkler rule
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / Court of Appeals invalidates fire sprinkler rule Court of Appeals invalidates fire sprinkler rule By: Brian Johnson October 13, 2015 5:02 pm 0 Minnesota homebuilders are hailing a Minnesota Court of Appeals decision that strikes down a state requirement for fire sprinklers in certain new homes. The Court of Appeals said in its decision Tuesday said that the sprinkler requirement for single-family houses 4,500 square feet and larger is “arbitrary and not supported by the record” and declared it ...
